item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 1, 2024 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Boris Vallejo and the pixel art of the demoscene (173 points | 35 comments)
2. Bop Spotter (1889 points | 317 comments)
3. Matrix-Libera IRC Bridge Temporary Shutdown, a Retrospective (2023) (29 points | 15 comments)
4. Show HN: qrframe – generate beautiful qr codes with javascript code (169 points | 24 comments)
5. PyTorch Native Architecture Optimization: Torchao (99 points | 22 comments)
6. MusicBrainz: An open music encyclopedia (270 points | 51 comments)
7. Show HN: Facad – A colorful directory listing tool for the command line (91 points | 60 comments)
8. Piracy (28 points | 9 comments)
9. Dockworkers at ports from Maine to Texas go on strike (59 points | 67 comments)
10. Essential node in global semiconductor supply chain hit by Hurricane Helene (67 points | 10 comments)
11. Pear AI founder: We made two big mistakes (77 points | 91 comments)
12. Show HN: Venator – Open-source threat detection (30 points | discuss)
13. Do All Problems Have Technical Fixes? (22 points | 6 comments)
14. Launch HN: Inkeep (YC W23) – Copilot for Support (think Cursor for help desks) (97 points | 53 comments)
15. Vanishing Culture: Preserving Cookbooks (75 points | 49 comments)
16. California bans legacy admissions at private universities (439 points | 445 comments)
17. AI chipmaker Cerebras files for IPO (162 points | 86 comments)
18. Why laptop support, why now: FreeBSD's strategic move toward broader adoption (14 points | 1 comment)
19. Sports Betting Apps Are Even More Toxic Than You Thought (37 points | 22 comments)
20. BorgBackup 2.0 supports Rclone – over 70 cloud providers in addition to SSH (130 points | 43 comments)
21. Phrase matching in Marginalia Search (152 points | 20 comments)
22. Show HN: A macOS app to prevent sound quality degradation on AirPods (152 points | 194 comments)
23. Ask HN: Should you reply STOP to unwanted texts? (31 points | 46 comments)
24. Ask HN: Any good essays/books/advice about software sales? (133 points | 56 comments)
25. The Case of the Missing Increment (10 points | discuss)
26. Fix photogrammetry bridges so that they are not "solid" underneath (45 points | 12 comments)
27. Keep Track: 3D Satellite Toolkit (154 points | 35 comments)
28. Do AI companies work? (310 points | 315 comments)
29. GnuCash 5.9 (211 points | 103 comments)
30. A Comprehensive Analysis of Package Hallucinations by Code Generating LLMs (22 points | 7 comments)
